com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups

Class KandyGroupSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups.KandyGroupSettings

  • public class KandyGroupSettings
extends Object
    The settings object to configure service specific configurations

    Note The default value to automatically download group image content is: ConnectionType.WIFI.
    You may change this value with: setAutoDownloadGroupImageConnectionType(ConnectionType)

        Set the auto-download policy, if image auto-download is: disabled, enabled on wi-fi only, on 3g only, or both
        Parameters:
        autoDownloadType - type to be set

      • getDownloadMediaPath

        public File getDownloadMediaPath()
        Deprecated. use IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder instead
        The absolute path to the location where the downloaded media content should be saved.

        Consider using Environment.getExternalStorageDirectory() as your root folder

      • getDownloadMediaPathBuilder

        public IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder getDownloadMediaPathBuilder()

      • setDownloadMediaPath

        public void setDownloadMediaPath(File downloadMediaPath)
        Deprecated. use IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder instead
        Set the path for downloaded media Note: The path must be to the directory not the path of the file
        Parameters:
        downloadMediaPath - new path to directory not the path of the file

      • setDownloadMediaPath

        public void setDownloadMediaPath(IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder downloadMediaPath)
        Set the path for downloaded media. Can specify own folder structure.
